highlighted_projects.description: Created a C# application to manage room availability, patient files and worker files. Using an Access database connected to the app through ERP, the app manages a whole hospital system to assign patients rooms, nurses and keep track of a lot of data regarding everything that happens in the hospital.
highlighted_projects.name: Hospital Patient Manager

jarvis_projects.description: Implemented a SQL database to store hardware and usage data on a Linux cluster. The database was created using PostgreSQL inside of a Docker container and gathers the data of various machines with a bash script that runs once at the start and one that runs every 5 minutes.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

name: Nicolas Langlois

professional_experience.description: Extract and integrate data from database and text files from Japanese Unity games to localize them in other languages. Alter and debug C# code to make sure the games work in other regions.
professional_experience.title: Unity Developer

professional_experience.description: Develop features of an automated build system, monitored it and assisted project members when failures arise.
professional_experience.title: DevOps Developer

professional_experience.description: Troubleshooted client's workers' technological issues and document the process on Service Now.
professional_experience.title: IT Analyst

professional_experience.description: Develop a mobile game using the Unity game engine. Tasks included coding game physics, UI, set up a database and integrating 3D assets.
professional_experience.title: Unity Developer

summary: I've always been intrigued by electronics, so as a curious and creative person it's no surprise that I jumped into software engineering. I graduated a few years back at CDI College and obtained an ACS. I have about 5 years of experience, mainly in the game industry as a developer with two of my most-used tools being C# and SQL. I am looking forward to growing in a data role or a back end role.
